fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Sing an alluring melody near a player's house tonight. Anyone visiting the house above or below your target will be captivated and unknowingly visit your target instead.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Mechanically functions as a redirect.
- With the Necromonicon, you also deal a Basic attack to your target.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose the Coven.
